newsitem.title: USA: Baroid acquires Desert Drilling Fluids Inc.
newsitem.headline: Baroid acquires Desert Drilling Fluids Inc.

text.p: Baroid Drilling Fluids Inc said on Wednesday it acquired Desert Drilling Fluids Inc (DDF), a Nevada corporation with operations in five states and business partnerships in several other countries.
Baroid Drilling Fluids Inc is a subsidiary of Dresser Industries Inc.
Terms of the acquisition were not disclosed.
